duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and operate HAAS CNC Mill and Slant Lathe with NGC Controller.
Train new employees on machinery operations and best practices.
Utilize Inspection equipment to ensure parts meet specifications.
Understand G Codes, M Codes, and tooling for Mill and Slant Lathe machines.
Observe and verify the conformance of machined parts to specifications.
Maintain work area in a clean, orderly, and safe manner.
Notify management of product discrepancies, equipment malfunctions, and safety issues.
Perform routine maintenance on equipment and tools.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. 8-10 years related experience and/or 10 years related training.
